Portal is an amazing game with unique problem solving scenarios that sets it apart from any other game, furthermore the game has subtle humour that I personal enjoy.

Seriously one of the most fun times I had playing a game! Took me about 5 hours and finished it in one go. Very addicting, riddles are ingenious, portal gun is crazy fun and gives you a wow factor every time you solve a riddle or finish a level. I also really appreciated the little story happening and the little splashes of humour throughout! 10/10! Definetely recommended!

Really good! I'm not very good with puzzle games but i highly enjoyed this one ^-^  i was stuck for a little bit at the first interaction with the shooting robots but that was because i am stupid and did not see the obvious red X above them. beautiful end song. i had never seen or played portal until this year so i am glad i got to experience this game :D highly recommend.
good

It's a Valve game. It's a Portal game. Nothing else to say. Just buy it. One of the best concepts for a game, in my opinion, ever. Story is amazing. Everything is amazing. It's only $7.
me lo pase en 3 horas, pero fueron unas 3 horas muy buenas

muito bom<3
好

My guided tour of the Apperture Facilities was horrible. At first everything went, they showed us the test runs and the cafeteria. But then I took a wrong turn and before you know it, the staff mistook me for test subject. They put me in a suit and made me run through a series of runs. It was fun at first, until the hazards became way too hard... I have asthma damnit, I can't do toxic fumes!
The safety protocol is laughable. And these numbskulls keep promising cake, when there is none on the cafeteria menu.
Классика уже. Необычный игровой процесс.

This game is amazing! Everything about this game is fabulous, the gameplay, levels, lore, ending. The Ending was the best! The music is so relaxing im up to listen this for hours, and after you complete the game, the main screen changed which gave me a huge dose of dopamine (Brain releases dopamine and that makes us feel happy)

The game premise is very simple and the graphics and sound match. Those are not criticisms. The focus is on mastering the game play mechanics. The game is enjoyable but brief and the wit shown in the sound and end song are highlights.

Как по мне, это прекрасная игра-головоломка, в которой есть хороший сюжет и в которой тебе [b]придётся[/b] включить мозг, потому что в некоторых моментах будет сложно понять, что делать дальше.
This game is to Portal 2 what The Terminator is to Terminator 2 and what Batman Begins is to The Dark Knight. It is the absolute classic that paved the way for one of the greatest games of all time.
portal is a yes no brainer
I Love this game, it just feels, lonely and pretty industrial. Recommended  if you like puzzle games

Le jeu est génial comme son deuxième opus.
Cependant, je ne trouve pas l'éditeur de niveau (que je vois très bien dans Portal 2).
Et le jeu ne marche pas avec une manette Xbox (pourtant, dans Portal 2, je peux utiliser une manette dans le jeu.)
I like being in a loop of portals,
Fantastic puzzle game with an amazing story

"I'm doing science, and I'm still alive... Still Alive."

Mesmo não sendo um amante de jogos do gênero puzzle, Portal foi para mim um jogo acima da média. É quase impossível não gostar de uma das melhores franquias de jogos de todos os tempos.

A experiência única de explorar os laboratórios abandonados da Aperture Science traz aquele clássico sentimento de vazio que só um jogo da Source Engine consegue proporcionar. 

Os monólogos da GLaDOS conseguem ser assustadores e engraçados ao mesmo tempo, e isso é genial. A forma como ela dita o que o jogador tem que fazer é fantástica. A forma sádica com que a GLaDOS tortura psicologicamente a protagonista é um contraste entre bizarrice e humor, o que só enaltece a performance na dublagem de Ellen Mclain na vilã.

A gameplay te conquista conforme você passa pelas câmaras de teste, entender como passar dos quebra-cabeças é bem intuitivo e desafiador. Confesso que tive alguns probleminhas para platinar o jogo (principalmente nos desafios dos mapas bônus), porém, terminar as conquistas foi bem mais tranquilo do que imaginei.

Um jogo que teoricamente iria ser só um "brinde" no pacote da Orange Box, se tornou um dos melhores jogos de puzzle de todos os tempos, sendo prestigiado até hoje como um dos melhores games da VALVe.

Compre junto com a continuação, vale à pena.

amazing game 10/10 great story
神作一代，男女都适合玩，不存在玩不了的人，大力推荐。
Очень советую поиграть.

Playing Portal is an absolute must for all denizens of Steam. It's a terrific game that makes you laugh, think and, if you were really looking forward to that cake, even cry. If you haven't played Portal, but you're thinking ~$15.00 is too much, just wait around for a sale - Portal & Portal 2 are frequently ~90% off. (I think I bought Portal 2 for $2.00, which felt like I was robbing Valve.)

Great soundtrack, fun puzzles, iconic voice acting, and a well earned cult-like following of musicians, artists and animators. Portal is a triumph. It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
